name: Mr. Mime
description: If interrupted while it is miming, it will slap around the offender with its broad hands.

abilities.name: Vital Spirit
abilities.effect: This Pokémon cannot be asleep.  This causes rest to fail altogether.  If a Pokémon is asleep and acquires this ability, it will immediately wake up; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.  This ability functions identically to insomnia in battle.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, higher-levelled Pokémon have their encounter rate increased.

abilities.name: Screen Cleaner
abilities.description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, the effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil are nullified for both opposing and ally Pokémon.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.effect: This Pokémon heals for 1/16 of its maximum HP after each turn during hail, and it does not take hail damage regardless of type.
abilities.description: The Pokémon regains HP in a hailstorm.
